argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ldualneg.r | |- R = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | ldualneg.m | |- M = ( invg ` R ) |
| 3 |  | ldualneg.d | |- D = ( LDual ` W ) |
| 4 |  | ldualneg.s | |- S = ( Scalar ` D ) |
| 5 |  | ldualneg.n | |- N = ( invg ` S ) |
| 6 |  | ldualneg.w | |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( oppR ` R ) = ( oppR ` R ) |
| 8 | 1, 7, 3, 4, 6 | #P_ldualsca | |- ( ph -> S = ( oppR ` R ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( invg ` S ) = ( invg ` ( oppR ` R ) ) ) |
| 10 | 7, 2 | #P_opprneg | |- M = ( invg ` ( oppR ` R ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 5, 10 | #P_3eqtr4g | |- ( ph -> N = M ) |
